Estonia: The crusader Livonian Brothers of the Sword are founded.
Italy: Fibonacci's Liber Abaci, a book on arithmetic, helps to popularise the Hindu–Arabic numeral system and brings the idea of the integer sequence known as the Fibonacci number to locations outside India.
Latvia: The Livonian Brothers of the Sword was founded by Bishop Albert.
Poland: Death of Mieszko III the Old, High Duke of Poland
